raw_text: FERNANDOPULLE Dr JBT (Homeopathic Doctor and Retd. Senior Asst. Director,​ Central Bank of Sri Lanka). Beloved husband of Scholastica,​ loving father of Dushan (USA),​ Niroshan,​ Shamila (Airport and Aviation,​ Katunayake) and Shivanthi (ex Seylan Bank),​ father-in-law of Poornima (USA) and Dhanuka (Director,​ Lanka Florists),​ loving grandfather of Thinuk. Cortege leaves residence at 3.30 p.m. on Wednesday the 4th of October for Burial at RC Cemetery,​ Welihena. 234/​1,​ Welihena,​ Kochchikade.062224

IMBULDENIYA – NALINI KADIGAMUWA – Beloved wife of late Somisara Imbuldeniya,​ daughter of late Delicia Ratwatta and late L.B. Kadigamuwa,​ late sister Dulsy Imbuldeniya,​ late brothers – Duglas,​ Norman,​ Anton,​ Sydney,​ Gamini,​ Patrick Kadigamuwa,​ brother – Asoka,​ sister – Renee and Indrani,​ daughters – Anusha (Canada),​ Krishanthi,​ Nilmini and Niroshini,​ in-laws – Ananda (Canada),​ Thilak Wasantha and Hemantha,​ grandchildren – Dushan,​ Lasitha,​ Prabodha,​ Madhushani,​ Ishan,​ Rawindu,​ Deshini (Canada) and Kenneth (Canada),​ expired. Remains lie at Priyantha Florists Funeral Parlour,​ No. 190,​ Eriyagama,​ Peradeniya. Cremation on Wednesday,​ 04th October 2023 at 2.45 p.m at Arambegama Cemetery. 0773465348,​ 0774333142.062599

PERERA – HARINDA (H.C.) (Habib Bank). Dearly beloved husband of Saruchi and father of Mireya,​ brother of Aruni,​ brother-in-law of Suren,​ Jithendra and Ruwanthi,​ son of late Indra and Chintha,​ son-in-law of Nissanka and Madhurie. Cortege leaves residence on 4th October at 4.15 p.m. Cremation at General Cemetery Kanatte at 5.00 p.m. The remains will be at 50/​3,​ Siripa Road,​ Colombo 05.062543
